query_request.description: The simple update query that returns update true/false. 1 = snapshot name 2 = snaptshot tag 3 = local version

fast_update_request.description: The fast update request with 1 = snapshot name 2 = snaptshot tag 3 = local version and the required packages separated by %2C commas (4 = required) and local_hash=hex-number hash of all of the package names/versions (5 = hash)

update_request.description: The full update request with the the listed packages in the POST. 1 = snapshot name 2 = snaptshot tag

package_storage_server.description: The hosts where the update packages are served in compressed format.

initialQueryWaitSeconds.description: The number of seconds to wait before starting the first update query (after launching) for package updates.

updateQueryIntervalSeconds.description: The number of seconds to wait between update queries or before querying again for a package update.
